publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "God and the King" is a translation of: Mocket, Richard. Deus et rex.
Dated at end: Theobalds the eighth day of Nouember, in the thirteenth yeere of our raigne ..
In this edition the last complete line of text ends: of.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
